meta.description: Premium AI-powered performance intelligence dashboard. Skeuomorphic, modern, deep shadows, glass surfaces, soft colors. Dark-first with green accents on black; light mode mirrors structure with white cards and soft gray borders.
meta.design_style: Skeuomorphic, modern, executive-grade, calm. Deep shadows, glass (subtle blur, low-opacity borders), soft gradient background. Two main palettes only: Primary (blue) for active/charts/CTAs; Secondary (cyan/teal) for AI accents. Grayscale neutrals; accent colors (green, red, amber) for status and charts only.

layout.structure: Left sidebar navigation + main content area (3-column: sidebar left, main right). Sidebar shifts below content on smaller breakpoints.
layout.max_width: Centered container, approx 1280–1440px; sidebar fixed width ~240–280px on desktop

grid.desktop: Sidebar fixed left; main content 12-column grid
grid.main_cards: Metric cards in 2–4 columns depending on breakpoint
grid.sidebar: Fixed left on xl; below content on lg and down

responsive_breakpoints_tailwind.sm: 640px – single column, cards stack, sidebar as drawer or top
responsive_breakpoints_tailwind.lg: 1024px – 3-column grid; sidebar stacks below main content
responsive_breakpoints_tailwind.xl: 1280px – full layout: sidebar left + main grid

color_system.design_brief_variant: Green accents, black background, white text (alternate spec)
color_system.implementation_palette: Primary blue, Secondary cyan/teal; grayscale neutrals; green/red/amber for status only

dark.background_gradient: Soft radial gradient (blue or neutral) top-right; calm, not heavy

primary_palette.usage: Active states, main charts, primary CTAs, highlighted metrics

secondary_palette.usage: AI accents, supporting visuals, secondary charts, progress fills

accent_colors_status_only.usage: Status indicators and chart semantics (positive/neutral/negative) only

gradient_usage.background: Soft radial overlay; avoid heavy color
gradient_usage.cards: Subtle radial glow top-right (primary or neutral)

typography.principle: Structured, calm. Hierarchy through size and weight.

navigation.position: Left sidebar (fixed on xl); shifts below on smaller breakpoints
navigation.active_style: Primary color pill or left border; subtle primary bg
navigation.inactive_style: Text secondary; hover bg-white/5 (dark) or bg-gray-100 (light)

line_chart.name: Account balances / Performance score over time
line_chart.description: Line chart showing trend (e.g. account balances or performance score over time)
line_chart.style: Smooth curves, gradient fill (primary → transparent), rounded elements, subtle glow on dots

table.name: Past transactions / Audit history
table.description: Table of past transactions or analysis runs
table.style: Glass card container; header muted; row hover bg-white/5; borders subtle

card_latest_news.name: Latest news / Recent insights
card_latest_news.description: Card showing latest news or product updates / recommendations
card_latest_news.layout: Title + short list or highlight + optional CTA

card_gains_losses.name: Total gains/losses / Performance delta
card_gains_losses.description: Card showing total gains/losses or net performance impact
card_gains_losses.layout: Large metric + trend indicator (green up / red down); optional sparkline

cards.metric_card: Icon + Title + Metric + Trend + optional chart
cards.insight_card: Text block + metric highlight + CTA buttons

micro_interactions.chart_hover: Tooltip with dark surface and subtle border

light_mode.principle: Mirror structure; replace dark surfaces with clean white cards and soft gray borders
